name: Instant Search
author: webmaster85 - Mărincaș Marius-Mugurel

sections.description:
Instant Search is a simple WordPress search plugin with AJAX support. You just activate the plugin and use the shortcode [instant_search] to display a search form anywhere. You can control the number of results from “Settings -> Reading -> Syndication feeds show the most recent.”

Dev Notes

Enjoy!

Contributors

Mărincaș Marius-Mugurel – https://www.marincas.net
sections.installation:
1. Upload the “instant-search” folder to the “/wp-content/plugins/” directory or upload the archive in WordPress’ Plugins menu
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Access the plugin’s settings from the WordPress sidebar menu
sections.faq:
Where should I place the shortcode?

The shortcode can be placed in any post, page, or text widget. For best visibility, I recommend placing the shortcode in the header of a website. Either with the help of a page builder (Divi) or placing the shortcode in the header file template of the theme.

Current Features:

  • AJAX search results
  • Return search results from all registered post types
  • Display AJAX search results in a grid
  • Display AJAX search results in a list
  • Submit form for searching
